dct_title_s: Archipelagus Atlanticus cum suis insulis Canariis, Hesperidibus et Azoribus
dct_description_sm: Map of the Azores, Canary Islands, and Cape Verde, and the west coast of Africa. Insets: Ins. Teneriffa, Ins. Canaria Magna. Pagination: Fol. XXZ. Appears in the author's Atlas novus. Munich : Ioannis Caspari Bencard, 1702-1710.
rights_statement_s:
No Known Copyright
